name: associating
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
associate
C1 to connect someone or something in your mind with someone or something else: Most people associate this brand with good quality.
More examplesFewer examplesMost people associate troglodytes with prehistoric times, but troglodyte communities still exist in Tunisia and China.Both politicians have been closely associated with the movement for some time.He has been associated with some dubious characters.I am happy, indeed proud, to be associated with this project.One or two of the earlier photos reveal an intriguing androgyny not normally associated with the actress.
